property.value: Secret Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Whenever one of your other creatures is put into your graveyard from anywhere, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has 'blocker' or a creature that has power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Secret Rare

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Infinite evolution Omega—Put this creature into the battle zone on any number of Guardian creatures from your graveyard, mana zone or battle zone. Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures and shuffle it into its owner's deck. Triple breaker While this creature is tapped, your opponent's creatures can't attack. Eternal Omega

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge 3 times. Each time you win and reveal a creature, put that creature into the battle zone instead of putting it on the bottom of your deck. Each time you win and reveal a spell, cast it for no cost instead of putting it on the bottom of your deck. Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'. Triple breaker Eternal Omega

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

card.name: Back to the Ore, Zenith of 'Ten Tail'

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take up to 2 spells that cost 6 or less from among your deck and show those spells to your opponent. Then shuffle your deck. Your opponent chooses one and puts it into your graveyard. Cast the other card for no cost. Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell that costs 6 or less from your graveyard for no cost. Then put that spell on the bottom of your deck. Double breaker Eternal Omega

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then, you may put a non-evolution dragon from your graveyard into the battle zone. Triple breaker Whenever one of your non-evolution dragons would be destroyed, add it to your shields face down instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck to each player. Put all spells from among them into your hand, and the rest on the top of your deck in any order. Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell from your hand for no cost. Triple breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, or when it leaves the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Human

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature leaves the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, choose one of the following. :► Put a Victory creature or a creature that costs 10 or more from your hand into the battle zone.:► Search your deck. Take a Victory creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Infinite evolution Omega—Put this creature into the battle zone on any number of colorless creatures from your graveyard, mana zone or battle zone. Whenever this creature attacks, for each card under this creature, choose one of the following.:► Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. :► Choose one of your opponent's cards in his hand at random and put it into its owner's mana zone. Quattro breaker Eternal Omega(When this creature would leave the battle zone, return it to your hand instead.)

property.value: Attack Chance- Shangri-La, Climax of 'Cruelty'(Whenever one of your Shangri-La, Climax of 'Cruelty's attack, you may cast this for no cost.) Put a creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. If you have a Zenith in the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent shuffles that creature into his deck.

property.value: Super Infinite evolution—Put on one or more of your creatures. {BLOCKER} Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your shield zone face down as a new shield. If you do, untap this creature at the end of that turn. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose another creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Then, you may put a creature that costs less than that creature from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Command/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less and you may return to its owner's hand. Then choose one of your opponent's psychic creatures in the battle zone, you may return to its owner's hyperspatial zone. Double breaker

property.value: Liquid People

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, you may draw a card. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.)

That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) Double breaker

property.value: Armored Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, or whenever this creature attacks, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less and destroy them. Double breaker

property.value: Armored Dragon/Unknown

property.value: Guardman(When one of your other creatures is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, the attacking creature will attack this creature instead.) Each turn, when this creature becomes tapped for the first time, untap it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, if one of your creatures in the battle zone has higher power then each of your opponent's creatures, look at the top 2 cards of your deck you may put one of them into your hand and the other into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have a colorless creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +6000 power and 'Triple breaker'. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you reveal this card during Gachinko Judge or when you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap or untap a creature in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a Guardian or a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose one of your colorless creatures. (They can still be attacked and blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack players. Whenever this creature blocks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, untap this creature and this creature gets +11000 power until the end of the turn. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.)
